chinese: 美延缓向加墨两国加征关税计划新京报2025-02-04 07:14△特朗普
pinyin: Měì Yuáncháng xiàng xiàng Mósì hé liú guó jiǎo shuī huà jianyè Xinhua News Agency ài shí February 4, 2025, ài 7:14 AM.
translation: U.S. delays imposing tariffs on Mexico and two other countries according to a new plan from the Xinhua News Agency as of February 4, 2025, at 7:14 AM.

breakdown.meaning: 延缓 (延 = delay, 缓 = slow)
加墨 (加 = add, 墨 = Mexico)
两国 (两 = two, 国 = country)
加征关税 (加征 = impose tariffs, 关税 = tariffs)
新京报 (新 = new, 京 = Beijing, 报 = report)

translation: On the left, and Trudeau

breakdown.meaning: Trudeau (特 = particular, 魏 = family; 魏 here is a variant of 'Family' in Chinese)

translation: Heavily local time on February 3rd.

breakdown.meaning: Local time (当 = local, 地 = place/time, 时间 = time)
February 3rd (数字 = digit(s), 月 = month, 日 = day)

chinese: 加拿大总理特鲁多表示
translation: The Prime Minister of Canada, Justin Trudeau, has stated that...

breakdown.meaning: Prime Minister (总 = total/sum, 理 = principles/mind)
Justin Trudeau (人 = person, 格 = manner)

chinese: 美国总统特朗普决定将暂缓对加拿大产品加征关税。
pinyin: Jiǎnádà Zōngtǒng Tǎngrén shìu jǐng chéng Duì Jiǎnádà huó dòng zī kōng guōnzǐ.
translation: President Trump of the United States has decided to temporarily suspend imposing tariffs on Canadian products.

breakdown.meaning: United States (加 = add, 达 = reach/arrive)
to do, to make (将 = to, 不 = not)
on Canadian products (对 = to, 加 = add, 拿 = grasp/handle)
to impose tariffs (加 = add, 征 = collect/tax, 关 = related)

translation: During the period of at least 30 days.

breakdown.meaning: during the period (为 = for, 期 = a period/time)
at least (最 = from first to last, 至 = as far as)

chinese: 加拿大方面也放弃实施报复性关税
pinyin: Jiǎnādá yào huán quì shèng xū jiāsuǒ bùsuo性关税
translation: The Canadian government has also decided to abandon the implementation of retaliatory tariffs.

breakdown.meaning: Canada (加 = add, 拿 = take, 大 = big)
side, aspect, or government stance (方面 = side/aspect, 放弃 = abandon)
retaliatory tariffs (报复性 = retaliatory, 关税 = tariffs)

translation: He stated/She announced

breakdown.meaning: Trudeau (a proper noun, the name of a person)

chinese: 加拿大正在实施一项耗资13亿美元的边境计划——用新的直升机
pinyin: Jīnàdágǎ zhíshì yìyí jīngzuò 13billion 美元 de biānghuán jiàhuán——yòng xīnín de zhíshèngjī
translation: Canada is currently implementing a plan costing 1.3 billion dollars for border measures — using new helicopters.

breakdown.meaning: Canada (加 = Canada, 拿 = to take)
border plan (边 = border, 疑 = doubt, 线 = line)
to use new ones (用 = to use, 新 = new)

translation: Technology and personnel have strengthened the border management.
To strengthen, to make something stronger.
Coordination between the United States and other countries.

breakdown.meaning: United States (美 = beautiful/USA, 利 = benefit, 州 = state)
coordination or adjustment (协 = coordination, 调 = adjust)

chinese: 近10000名前线人员正在保护边境
pinyin: jīn bǎi shí wàn qù miàntái人员 zǐ yóu bù háo jiān biān
translation: Thousands of frontline staff are currently protecting the border.

breakdown.meaning: Approximately 10,000 people (近 = near/frequently, 10000 = ten thousand, 前 = front/first)
Frontline staff (前 = front, 线 = line/force, 人员 = personnel)

breakdown.pinyin: zǐ yóu bù háo jiān biān
breakdown.meaning: Currently protecting (正在 = in the process of, 保护 = to protect)
Border or frontier area (边 = border, 境 = boundary)

translation: Canada has made a new promise.

breakdown.meaning: add (in proper nouns, part of '加拿大')
hold or carry (in proper nouns, part of '加拿大')
big (in proper nouns, part of '加拿大', meaning Canada)
promise (承 = to take; 诺 = agreement)

chinese: 将把贩毒集团列为恐怖分子
pinyin: Jǐng bǐ huán dài jitóng liù qǔ fēnghóng dān zǐ
translation: Will label the drug trafficking group as a terrorist.

breakdown.meaning: Will; to will or be about to (将 = will)
to put, to place (把 = to put)
Drug Trafficking Group (贩毒 = drug trafficking, 集团 = group/organization)
to label as; to classify (列 = to list, 为 = for)
Terrorist (恐怖 = terrorism, 分子 = individual/person)

pinyin: Qìng Bìangwàng Qián Tiān Cáo Jiàn kǒu
translation: Ensure comprehensive border monitoring around the clock.
Canada was established.

breakdown.meaning: to establish/found (成 = to establish, 立 = stand/set up)
Canada (加 = Canada, 拉 = relating to, 大 = big)

translation: Union Task Force

breakdown.meaning: union, alliance (利 = benefit, 恆 = union)
to unite, partnership (合 = to join together)
Task Force (打 = attack, 击 = strike, 部队 = team/unit)

translation: Strike organized crime.

breakdown.meaning: to strike, to attack (打 = hit, 击 = strike)
organized group or organization (有 = possession, 组织 = organization)

translation: Money laundering and other activities.

breakdown.meaning: to wash (清 = clean, 膍 = fold)

translation: Trump stated the following on that day.

breakdown.meaning: Trump (唐 = Chou as a surname, 普 = Pu, meaning wide or broad)
on that day (当 = on that day, 天 = day)

chinese: 并证实了推迟对加拿大征收关税的消息
pinyin: Bǐng shìjī le tuīdé duì Kǎnādà de zhí shōu guōshuǐ de xuéwén。
translation: The government has confirmed the delay in collecting tariffs from Canada.

breakdown.meaning: also, confirm; to证实 (shìjī) = to confirm
collection; to levy (征=to collect, 收=to gather)

chinese: 特朗普2月1日签署行政令
pinyin: Térlǜp èryuè 1 rì Qīngzhāo Xìngshǎng Lìng
translation: On February 1st, Trump signed an executive order.

breakdown.meaning: February 1st (2 = two, 月 = moon/September, 日 = day)
executive order (signing of an administrative decree)

chinese: 宣布将对加拿大进口商品加征25%关税
pinyin: Zhāobù shí duì Jiǎnādá chéng shang wù huò biào jiè 25% Guōshuǔ
translation: The government has announced a 25% customs duty on imported goods from Canada.

breakdown.meaning: To announce officially (宣 = to announce, 布 = to make public)
To impose, to increase (将 = to arrange or increase)
Canada (加 = Canada, 拉 = to pull, 大 = big)
Imported goods (进 = import, 商 = business, 货 = goods)
To increase or impose (加 = to add, 征 = to collect)
A 25% customs duty (关税 = customs duty)

chinese: 将对价值1550亿加元的美国进口产品征收25%的关税
pinyin: Jiùduì shímǎ yóu jī yuán de Měilǐ jiūrù huāngzǐ 25% de guōsshǜi
translation: A 25% tariff will be imposed on imported American products worth 1,550 million dollars.

breakdown.meaning: United States (美 = beautiful, 利 = benefit)

chinese: 美暂缓向墨西哥加征关税△墨西哥总统辛鲍姆当地时间2月3日早些时候
pinyin: Měi zànzhú xiáng Shàmen qū zhánh Guān Shà  △ Mèixìgē zònghù Sin Bó mǎ dāngjí shíjiānzǐ zǎosomende
translation: The U.S. temporarily suspends tariffs against Mexico. Mexican President Peña Nieto, referred to by the nickname 'Sin Bola,' made this statement locally on February 3rd early in the day.

breakdown.meaning: temporary suspension (暂 = temporary, 缓 = slow/pause)
Mexico (墨 = black/Chinese character, 西 = west, 哥 = brother)
symbolizing a significant action or development
Name of the Mexican President (辛 = without sin, 鲍姆 = a nickname for Peña Nieto)
some time early in the day

translation: Trump

breakdown.meaning: The name of a prominent figure, often referring to former U.S. President Donald Trump.
A phonetic element in the name, possibly representing a sound or characteristic associated with the name.
Another phonetic element in the name, often used in Chinese to represent sounds that do not correspond directly to English letters.

chinese: 墨西哥总统辛鲍姆通话
pinyin: Mòxīgē Zǒngtù Qīn Bào mù Tóuhuà
translation: The President of Mexico, Vicente Fox, is making a phone call.

breakdown.meaning: 墨 (Mò) - '墨' 是汉字中的一部分，意为'mo'.
西 (Xī) - '西' 意为'west'或指向西方。
哥 (Gē) - '哥' 是一个常见的汉字，意为'elder brother'或'veteran'.
辛 (Qīn) - '辛' 通常指代名字 Vicente，意为Vicente Fox。
鲍姆 (Bào mù) - '鲍姆' 是名字 Vicente的变体，意为Vicente Fox。
通话 (Tóuhuà) - to make a phone call.

translation: Xin Baum says that.
She, Her

chinese: 特朗普达成了一系列协议
translation: Trump has reached a series of agreements.

breakdown.meaning: Trump (特 = special, 朗 = sound, 布 = cloth)
to reach, to achieve (达 = reach, 成 = accomplish)
a series, a number of (一 = one, 代表 = representative)

chinese: 墨西哥将立即派遣1万名国民警卫队人员加强北部边境巡逻
pinyin: Mòxīgē jiāng lì yuán bǎi zhi wàn nàm guó mín zhàn wèi rén shén qū jiānhuǒ Běibù jiāodong xunxúng
translation: The Mexican government will immediately deploy 10,000 members of the National Guard to strengthen border patrols in the northern region.

breakdown.meaning: Mexico (墨 = Mexico, 西 = west, 哥 =哥)
Northern border area (北 = north, 部 = part/section, 边 = border)

chinese: 以防止从墨西哥向美国贩运芬太尼等毒品
pinyin: Yǐ fàngzhǐ cómó Sibàiguó xiàng Měicān ī huán fēntǒnǐ díng zuìdù
translation: To prevent drug trafficking from Mexico to the United States.

breakdown.meaning: to prevent (以 = in order to, 防止 = prevent)
Mexico (墨 = Mexico, 西 = west, 哥 = brother)
United States of America (美 = beautiful/country, 国 = nation)
to traffic/trafficking (贩 = to sell, 运 = transport)
fentanyl (芬 = fennel or fentanyl, 氮 = nitrogen)
and other drugs (毒 = poison/drug, 品 = substance/product)

chinese: 双方团队将从当天开始在安全和贸易两个方面继续开展工作
pinyin: Shuāngfàn tuán tuī jǐng gāi zídóu kāi lì zai 安全和贸易 liǎng xiàng shēniang jiù xìng qù wú
translation: The joint team will begin its work in the fields of security and trade starting today.

breakdown.meaning: both sides (双 = both, 方 = side)
security and trade (安全 = security, 和 = and, 贸易 = trade)
two aspects (两个 = two, 方面 = aspect/field)
continue to carry out work (继续 = continue, 开展 = develop/carry out)

chinese: 关税征收计划从当天起暂停实施一个月
pinyin: Guānshuì zhī shōusǒu jihua从dangtian开始暂停实行一个月
translation: Starting from today, the tax collection plan will be temporarily suspended for one month.

breakdown.meaning: Customs duty (关 = customs, 税 = tax)
Tax collection (征 = levy, 收 = collect)
Temporarily suspend (暂 = temporary, 停 = stop)
One month (个 = one, 月 = month)

translation: The day

breakdown.meaning: that day/day (当 = that day, usually used with a noun)

chinese: 美国总统特朗普发文称
translation: President Trump has issued a statement.

breakdown.meaning: the United States (国 = country, 美 = beautiful)

translation: He has (already)

breakdown.meaning: already; a particle used to indicate that the action has been done before or is no longer necessary.

translation: Over the course of one month
During this period.

breakdown.meaning: period/time; interval (期 = period/time, 间 = interval/between)

chinese: 将由美国国务卿鲁比奥
translation: Will be appointed by U.S. Secretary of State Rubinio

breakdown.meaning: to decide, to choose (属 = to have charge of, 可 = can)
by, under the arrangement/authority (于 = in terms of, 吴 = ? [in some contexts,吴=Yu])
United States (美 = beautiful, 国 = country)
Secretary of State (国 = nation/country, 审 = office, 卿 = official title)
Rubinio [last name] (鲁 = Rubi, 比 = bi, AO=AO)

chinese: 财政部长斯科特·贝森特和商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克以及墨西哥的高级代表主导谈判
pinyin: Caízheng部长Scott·Benson和ShangwubizhangHoward·Luttnick以及México的高级代表主导谈判
translation: The Finance Minister Scott Benson and the Business Minister Howard Luttnick, along with a high-ranking representative from Mexico, lead the negotiations.

breakdown.meaning: Finance Minister (财政 = finance/economy, 部长 = head/leader)
Scott (斯 = s, 且 = like; 代表名字的一部分)
Benson (贝 = b, 森 = forest; 代表名字的一部分)
Business Minister (商务 = business, 部长 = head/leader)
Howard (霍 = hao, 华 = Chinese for 'flower'; 代表名字的一部分)
Luttnick (卢 = lu, 特 = te, 尼 = ni, 克 = ke; 代表名字的一部分)
High-ranking representative from Mexico (墨 = mo, 西 = west, 哥 = brother; 代表墨西哥及其高级代表)

translation: He is looking forward to something.

pinyin: Xīn Bào Mù gong hé cǒu
translation: Xin Baum also participates.

breakdown.meaning: bitter; surname Xin (辛 = hardship, 苦 = bitterness)
surname Hao (鲍 = fish, 鸳 = crane)
Mu; used in some romanizations for Chinese names
to join together; collaborative (公 = public, 合 = to join)

translation: negotiation

breakdown.meaning: to discuss, to negotiate (谈 = discussion, 协商 = negotiation)

pinyin: tā yòng shǒujī zhì fu shuǐdé fèi.
translation: He uses his mobile phone to pay for water and electricity fees.

breakdown.meaning: mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)
water and electricity fees (付 = to pay, 费 = fee)

chinese: 总台记者 张颖哲 张森 许骁）相关阅读：
pinyin: Zǒngtái jìmù Zhāng Yíngzhé Zhāng Sēn Xǔ Qiáo）xuéduōduōduǒ：
translation: Chief Editor from the Taiwan region, Zhang Yizhe, Zhang Sen, Xu Qiao）Related Reading:

breakdown.meaning: The chief editor from the Taiwan region. (总 = general, 台 = Taiwan, 记者 = journalist)
Name: Zhang Yizhe. (张 = surname Zhang, 颖 = intelligent,哲 = wisdom)
Name: Zhang Sen. (张 = surname Zhang, 森 = forest or mountain)
Name: Xu Qiao. (许 = to permit/allow, 骁 = strong and skilled)
